name: Wonderus Automatons V2
description:
The C.O.R.E (Central Operation for Runtime Environment) is malfunctioning. To stop the total shutdown of Grunge, certain parts are necessary. Your job is to track down the parts from the residents around the city and collect them.

Clancy Wells : Design contributor, Game Tester

Ben Reuben: sound Asset collection, character design, asset collection

Maddy Roy : Environments, asset collection, game developer

Leah Reed:  Asset collection
